title: Molly Doll
description: Genre: Historical, Menage a Trois/Quatrehttp://www.bookstrand.com/may-waterProper Bostonian Molly has a sweet tooth—until she tastes the sweet sting of BDSM. Jess, Michael, and Evan spread Molly's legs while opening her heart. This sweet, sexy foursome elevates ménage to an art form. Now Molly craves whips, chains, and everything pain—with a cherry on top.Follow the sexy fun foursome as they travel to early-1900s Gloucester for a sex-filled weekend. Molly once again surrenders by the sea. This time she may come home with more than collected beach shells. Could our lovely lass be pregnant? If so, will Molly raise the child with Jess, or take the expected route and marry Michael?The ordeal leads the foursome to create the first bisexual foursome marriage in Provincetown, fully committing their lives to each other. This feisty foursome will do more than touch your heart. They will touch dark, erotic places begging to be unleashed.Genre: Historical, Menage a Trois/Quatre
author: May Water
